The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (extended edition)

wikitext.*:
{{Stub}}
'''Pippin's Task''' is the twelfth scene of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' and the seventeenth scene of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King'' (extended edition)]].

=== Synopsis ===
[[Peregrin Took|Pippin]] is tasked by [[Gandalf]] with the lighting of [[Minas Tirith]]'s beacon after [[Denethor]] dismisses Gandalf's advice to do so. 
[[Category:The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King scenes|17]]
